content.raw: We have added the hector quadrotor sonar to the X4_with_sensors.xacro file.  We have added it as a downward facing sonar, and we've also added an upward facing lidar.   We chose limits that seem reasonable relative to the real world.  We are happy to share this with the entire user community.  We would like to start using this sensor to support our solution to the subt challenge.  Please let us know if this is ok or if we need to seek approval from DARPA.
content.html: We have added the hector quadrotor sonar to the X4_with_sensors.xacro file. We have added it as a downward facing sonar, and we've also added an upward facing lidar. We chose limits that seem reasonable relative to the real world. We are happy to share this with the entire user community. We would like to start using this sensor to support our solution to the subt challenge. Please let us know if this is ok or if we need to seek approval from DARPA.
